title: Paper Towns
author: John Green
quote: You have to get lost before you can find yourself
desc: some of you might know the movie called paper town, but fewer people know that it used to be a book before. - I like the way that is not mainly about a love story but focus more on the character's mindset, so you might find some actions that you aren't related in but most of them are reasonable enough.
